ygData.subject: Re: lifeleech quest! MINOR SPOILER
ygData.msgSnippet: ... MINOR SPOILER BELOW * * * * * * * * Paladins, Rangers, and Bards all have 49th level spells unique to them.  Life Leech is ours.  It is a 280 lifetap for
ygData.messageBody:
"Steven E. Phipps" wrote:
>
> From: "Steven E. Phipps" <phipps@...>
>
> No shit! Throw us a bone here fellas, least tell us what the hell it is?
> (SK need some bones threw at them, that dont have a hidden 3x mana cost)
> This is the first exciting thing Ive heard about our class, so least tell us
> what the hell your talking about..
> (if this is something that sucks i am gonna be pissed)
>

MINOR SPOILER BELOW
*
*
*
*
*
*
*
*

Paladins, Rangers, and Bards all have 49th level spells unique to
them. Life Leech is ours. It is a 280 lifetap for 315 mana with
a 2.5 sec casting time and a 2 minute recharge time.

You should really read the Knight Watch message boards, there's quite
a bit of info on it there, which has been accumulating over the last
week. The site is run by the same people as the Shaman's Crucible,
but I moderate the newsgroups and edit/write guides and spell lists
for them to post.

Xilith T'Vyn
The Knight Watch
http://www.soerbaird.com/shadowknight
